required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Green Tea Extract on Lipids in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of a 12-week Administration of Green Tea Extract on Lipids in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes

lead_sponsor.agency: Centro Universitario de Ciencias de la Salud, Mexico

clinical_study.source: Centro Universitario de Ciencias de la Salud, Mexico

brief_summary.textblock: The main objectives of this study were to evaluate the effect of a 12-week supplementation with GTE (400 mg every 12 hours) on serum lipids, arterial stiffness and inflammatory cytokines in patients with T2DM.

detailed_description.textblock: A 12 week randomized double-blind, placebo-controlled trial was conducted in patients with T2DM to evaluate the effect of green tea extract (sunphenon 90D, TAIYO international, Minneapolis, US) at a 400 mg/12 hrs dose or calcined magnesia (400 mg/12 hrs) on lipids, anthropometric variables, arterial stiffness and inflammatory cytokines.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: patients were randomly assigned to receive green tea extract (sunphenon 90D, TAIYO international, Minneapolis, US) at a 400 mg/12 hrs dose or calcined magnesia (400 mg/12 hrs).
study_design_info.masking_description: An external pharmacy laboratory encapsulated the GTE and placebo, blinded and coded the study treatments.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in cholesterol at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measured using the Erba Manheim XL-100 automatic chemistry analyzer

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in HDL at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measured using the Erba Manheim XL-100 automatic chemistry analyzer

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in LDL at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Calculated using Friedewald's equation for LDL (LDL = cholesterol - HDL - triglycerides/5)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in triglycerides at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measured using the Erba Manheim XL-100 automatic chemistry analyzer

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in VLDL at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Calculated using Friedewald's equation for VLDL (VLDL = triglycerides/5)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in augmentation index at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measured using the Omron HEM-9000AI tonometric system after resting in the sitting position for 5 minutes

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pulse pressure at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measured using the Omron HEM-9000AI tonometric system after resting in the sitting position for 5 minutes

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in central systolic blood pressure at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measured using the Omron HEM-9000AI tonometric system after resting in the sitting position for 5 minutes

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in IL-6 at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measurement was done using commercially available ELISA kits from Peprotech

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in IL-1β at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measurement was done using commercially available ELISA kits from Peprotech

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in TNF-α at week 12
primary_outcome.description: Measurement was done using commercially available ELISA kits from Peprotech

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in glucose at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured using the Erba Manheim XL-100 automatic chemistry analyzer

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Hemoglobin A1c at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured using the Bio-Rad Variant Classic Hemoglobin testing system

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in systolic blood pressure at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured using the Omron HEM-9000AI tonometric system after resting in the sitting position for 5 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in diastolic blood pressure at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured using the Omron HEM-9000AI tonometric system after resting in the sitting position for 5 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in IMC at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured with the Tanita TBF-215 Body Composition Analyzer

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in body fat percentage at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured with the Tanita TBF-215 Body Composition Analyzer

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fat mass at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured with the Tanita TBF-215 Body Composition Analyzer

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in lean mass at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured with the Tanita TBF-215 Body Composition Analyzer

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in body water at week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Measured with the Tanita TBF-215 Body Composition Analyzer

arm_group.description: Green tea extract, 400 mg every 12 hours for 12 weeks
Calcined magnesia, 400 mg every 12 hours for 12 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with type 2 diabetes
Exclusion Criteria:
- Type 1 diabetes
- Smoking patients
- Ischemic heart disease
- Use of anti-inflammatory or antioxidant drugs
- Previously diagnosed liver or thyroid disease

facility.name: Institute of Experimental and Clinical Therapeutics (INTEC), CUCS, University of Guadalajara
